bug.author: nan-wang
bug.summary: changes of existing executors in jina-hub are not registered by `register_class()`
bug.description:
local changes of executors in are registered by the method. Check more details at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina-hub/pull/295#issuecomment-683279092>jina-ai/jina-hub#295 (comment)</denchmark-link>
This will block the future maintenance of jina-hub.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina-hub/pull/295#issuecomment-683279092>jina-ai/jina-hub#295 (comment)</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
Environment Screenshots â”†Issue is synchronized with this <denchmark-link:https://jinaai.atlassian.net/browse/JINACORE-199>Jira Task</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://www.unito.io/learn-more>Unito</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I don't get it why only <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/jina/issues/295>#295</denchmark-link> face the problem while others don't?
